document_data.mainbody:
Twaine Stone was a jackalwere inhabiting the island of Moray within the Moonshae Isles during the late 15 century DR.
Twaine was a member of the Black Blood tribe and was sent to infiltrate the garrison of Caer Moray. He left secret messages outside of Caer Morays walls, sharing critical information with the Black Bloods so they could better plan an attack on the town when he deemed it to be most vulnerable. He planned to open the gates of the fortress and sabotage the defenses from within.
